description: Sent when asBsduBsPortStatusConnectionState changes or when BS, conencted to the port has changed
changed. The change of connected BS normally should by reported by sending 2 traps:
- first for old BS with state not connected
- second for new BS with state connected
Fast changes of connected BS are normally identified by change in reported MAC address.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD AIRSPAN-BSDU-MIB::asBsduBsPortStateChangedTrap AIRSPAN-BSDU-MIB::asBsduBsPortStatusConnectionState i 1 AIRSPAN-BSDU-MIB::asBsduBsPortStatusBsIpAddressType i 0 AIRSPAN-BSDU-MIB::asBsduBsPortStatusBsIpAddress s EXAMPLE AIRSPAN-BSDU-MIB::asBsduBsPortStatusBsMacAddress s EXAMPL AIRSPAN-BSDU-MIB::asBsduBsPortStatusBsProductType s EXAMPLE IF-MIB::ifIndex i 9999

description: The state of the connection on the BS port.
variables.name: AIRSPAN-BSDU-MIB::asBsduBsPortStatusConnectionState

description: The type of IP address of the connected BS discovered automatically by BSDU.
variables.name: AIRSPAN-BSDU-MIB::asBsduBsPortStatusBsIpAddressType

description: IP address of the connected BS discovered automatically by BSDU.
variables.name: AIRSPAN-BSDU-MIB::asBsduBsPortStatusBsIpAddress

description: MAC address of the connected BS discovered automatically by BSDU.
variables.name: AIRSPAN-BSDU-MIB::asBsduBsPortStatusBsMacAddress

description: Product type reported by connected BS.
variables.name: AIRSPAN-BSDU-MIB::asBsduBsPortStatusBsProductType

description: A unique value, greater than zero, for each interface. It
is recommended that values are assigned contiguously
starting from 1. The value for each interface sub-layer
must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of
the entity's network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifIndex

description: Sent when power state changes as defined by object asBsduBsPortStatusPowerState.
This trap may be used by manager to generate a power failure alarm.
A unique value, greater than zero, for each interface. It
is recommended that values are assigned contiguously
starting from 1. The value for each interface sub-layer
must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of
the entity's network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifIndex

description: Reports the state of power line for each BS port.
variables.name: AIRSPAN-BSDU-MIB::asBsduBsPortStatusPowerState
